name: Pictures with Santa (Lite)
description:
With all of Santa's time occupied by his annual events at the mall and parties it's very difficult to snag a photo with the old guy! Lucky for you, a crack team of elves have toiled away this year to give you a solution: the Pictures with Santa app for all iOS devices!

This lite version only comes with two scenes to choose from. The full version is also available with dozens of gorgeous pictures to use.

Simply pull out your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch and use the camera or photo library to insert the face of yourself, your friends, or unsuspecting passers-by into a variety of holiday scenes! Instantly become a child on Santa's lap, a sleigh driver in a wintry wonderland, or finally get that baby-in-a-Santa-hat picture you've always wanted!

Your Christmas card photos will finally bring the smiles and laughter that you know they deserve! Instantly email your family and friends with the built in Message Sender or save the new pictures to your Photo Library, Photo Stream, and iCloud! You can even save your images to use with the Apple Cards app and mail Season's Greetings to your friends and family!

- Combine a holiday scene and a photo from your camera or photo library to create the perfect picture you have always wanted.
- Creates a print quality image that you can save and share with anyone you want.
- Instantly email or save your gorgeous new pictures! Create funny and silly images or heartwarming family portraits!

Pictures with Santa Features:
- iPhone, iPod touch, iPad compatible (including iPhone 5, iPad mini and the new iPad)
- Graphics designed for Retina displays - no fuzziness
- Available for iOS 4.3+
